title: nALai varum enru
sahitya:
nALai varum enru nambalAmA guhan tALai paNindaruL pera vENDAmA


anupallavi

  vElaippiDitta kandavELai manamurugi kAlai mAlai iru vELaiyum tudikkAmal


caraNam    azhagAna vAlibam aNunguDanE tIrum tiraNDu varum nEram kavalai  pala kUDum
tiru murugan nAmam ninaikka nEramillai mana tirai enbadu engO teriyavillai
